pages.text: Quite possibly a concept as old as Minecraft itself, the $(item)Recall Potion$() allows the user to instantly return to their $(thing)Spawnpoint$() by exploiting some subspace shenanigans, whose inner workings we're still unsure about. This magical brew can be attained by imbuing an $(item)Awkward Potion$() with the powers of an $(item)Ender Pearl$() in a $(thing)Brewing Stand$().
